title: 需要WaterFall的反压测插件！
author: 清壹色
txt_content:
BC端核心为 WaterFall
需要各大反假人压测好用的
服务端已装AntiFakePlayer

MCBBS: https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-654195-1-1.html

有大佬还有其他推荐的嘛

replies.author: 思念化作海
replies.txt_content:
